mcserverversion.title: Minecraft Version
mcserverversion.description: The server runs [Fabric 1.19.2](https://fabricmc.net/) for the **Java Edition** of Minecraft.

mcserverdisclaimer.title: Disclaimer
mcserverdisclaimer.description: By joining the Minecraft server you expose your IP address to the server admins. Your IP will **never** be shared, even with your permission.
